eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.model.fd

Class AdvanceCompositeBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.model.fd.AdvanceCompositeBlock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XSerializable

    public class AdvanceCompositeBlock
extends Object
implements XSerializable
    The composite block description for the flow description of flow-description.xsd.
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.06.21.

    • Field Summary

      The binding definition of internal blocks and/or boundary parameters.

      The optional sub-elements of this block.

      Optional composite inner block.
      Map<String,AdvanceConstantBlock> constants
      Optional constant inner block.
      String documentation
      The user-entered documentation of this composite block.
      String id
      The unique identifier of this block among the current level of blocks.
      Map<String,AdvanceCompositeBlockParameterDescription> inputs
      The optional boundary-parameter of this composite block which lets other internal or external blocks bind to this block.
      List<String> keywords
      The user-entered keywords for easier finding of this block.
      Map<String,AdvanceCompositeBlockParameterDescription> outputs
      The optional boundary parameter of this composite block which lets other internal or external blocks to bind to this block.
      AdvanceCompositeBlock parent
      The parent block of this composite block.
      AdvanceBlockVisuals visuals
      The visual properties for the Flow Editor.

      • hasBinding

        public boolean hasBinding(String srcBlock,
                 String srcParam,
                 String dstBlock,
                 String dstParam)
        Check if the given binding exists.
        Parameters:
        srcBlock - the source block or "" if it is the composite
        srcParam - the source parameter
        dstBlock - the destination block or "" if it is the composite
        dstParam - the destination parameter.
        Returns:
        true if the binding is present
